description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Maniacs:
Your {RACE_Maniac}s start battles with 25% more {STAT_health} and 10% less {STAT_defense} for each {RACE_Maniac} fighting on your side. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Maniac
